meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Steve Shimberg Leslie Bitner Tim Toburen Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #2689.

td.p: Steve Shimberg, an insurance agent from Melrose, Massachusetts
Leslie Bitner, a law student from Houston, Texas
Tim Toburen, a technical director from Jacksonville, Florida (whose 1-day cash winnings total $18,398)

tr.td: RUSSIAN RULERS
THE MOVIES
BRITISH HODGEPODGE
FASHION
THE BIBLE
3-LETTER WORDS
